name: VZBridgedNetworkInterface
desc: An object that identifies the supported network interfaces of the host computer.

items.name: class var networkInterfaces: [VZBridgedNetworkInterface]
items.desc: The bridged network interfaces that you may use in your virtual machine.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The unique BSD name of this network interface.

items.name: var localizedDisplayName: String?
items.desc: A user-visible name for the network interface.
